agentCard.name: Task Queue Orchestrator Agent
agentCard.description: Enterprise-grade task queue orchestration service supporting multiple backends (Celery, Prefect, Temporal, built-in) with robust retry mechanisms, circuit breakers, and comprehensive monitoring for replacing manual concurrency patterns
